paper_abstract: In this paper we apply to the unsteady Navier-Stokes problems some results concerning a posteriori error estimates and adaptive algorithms known for steady Navier-Stokes, unsteady heat and reaction-convection-diffusion equations and unsteady Stokes problems. Our target is to investigate the real viability of a fully combined space and time adaptivity for engineering problems. The comparison between our numerical simulations and the literature results demonstrates the accuracy and efficiency of this adaptive strategy. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Space-time adaptive simulations for unsteady Navier-Stokes problems
